Music Bingo at Fedora's Cigar & Wine Bar - 80’s Edition! Wear your best 80’s costumes to win a prize! Music Bingo is Saturday June 14th, from 7-9pm! Every round the winner wins a free drink! Privacy Policy Creekside Cigar Co respects your privacy. If you sign up for any of our engagement and outreach programs, including those that use SMS text messaging, we ONLY use information you provide to transmit your mobile messages and, upon request, respond to you directly. This includes sharing information with our program partners, message content providers, phone companies, and vendors who assist us in the delivery of mobile messages. EXCEPT AS SET FORTH IN THIS SECTION, WE DO NOT SELL, RENT, LOAN, TRADE, LEASE OR OTHERWISE TRANSFER FOR PROFIT ANY PHONE NUMBERS OR CUSTOMER INFORMATION COLLECTED THROUGH PROGRAMS TO ANY THIRD PARTY. We do reserve the right at all times to disclose any information as necessary to satisfy any law, regulation or governmental request, to avoid liability, or to protect our rights or property. When you complete forms online or otherwise provide us information at point of sale, you agree to provide accurate, complete, and true information. Founders | Founders Cigar Company | Veteran Owned Cigars + Accessories Skip to content Home Shop Cigars Hamilton Candela Franklin Connecticut Signature Dual Wrap Douglass Habano Roosevelt Maduro Legacy Blends Find A Retailer About Us Blog Contact Us Corporate Gifting Home Shop Cigars Hamilton Candela Franklin Connecticut Signature Dual Wrap Douglass Habano Roosevelt Maduro Legacy Blends Find A Retailer About Us Blog Contact Us Corporate Gifting $ 0.00 0 Cart Premium Cigars from a Veteran Owned, Top-Rated Cigar Brand Discover Our Small-Batch Blends from a Veteran-Owned Premium Cigar Brand Crafted for Character: Premium Cigar Blends You Can Buy Online or at your Favorite Cigar Shop Our cigars are from the Dominican Republic, rolled with care, and ready for you to enjoy with your friends and family. Hamilton Candela Franklin Connecticut Signature Dual Wrap Douglass Habano Roosevelt Maduro Premium Cigars Paired with Cigar Education + Community At Founders Cigar Company, we’re here to equip both seasoned cigar enthusiasts and those new to the cigar world with premium cigars from a top cigar brand you can trust. Whether you’re looking to buy cigars online for a special occasion or to enjoy your everyday ritual, our collection delivers bold flavor, consistent craftsmanship, and a legacy of excellence. We’re also passionate about education— our blog is packed with helpful guides on how to cut a cigar , light a cigar , and navigate cigar culture and etiquette with confidence. From first light to final draw, Founders is your go-to veteran-owned cigar brand for quality, knowledge, and community. Gift a Custom Cigar Box At Founders Cigar Company, we’ve created the ultimate custom cigar box—a premium gift that’s as personal as it is unforgettable. Whether you’re shopping for corporate gifting, groomsmen gifts, bachelor parties, or Father’s Day, our cigar box is designed to leave a lasting impression. Each handcrafted box includes 16 premium cigars from a top cigar brand, along with a high-quality cutter and lighter—everything they need to enjoy a perfect smoke. What makes it truly special? You can customize the lid with your logo, name, date, or personal message, turning it into a keepsake that’s both stylish and meaningful. Whether you’re celebrating milestones or building client relationships, Founders’ custom cigar box delivers quality, character, and craftsmanship in every detail. Order yours today. Ask Your Local Cigar Shop for Founders Cigars​ We love when cigar enthusiasts shop local—there’s nothing like enjoying a premium cigar from your favorite hometown lounge or retailer. If your local cigar shop doesn’t carry Founders Cigars yet, ask them to! As a veteran-owned premium cigar brand, we’re proud to be featured in cigar shops across the country, and we’d be honored to be on the shelves of your favorite spot. Whether you’re looking to buy cigars locally or help introduce a top cigar brand to your community, your support helps us grow and share our passion for premium cigars with more enthusiasts like you. Find A Retailer Near You! We Believe In Supporting Veterans + Local Communities At Founders, We Support Our Veterans Cigars Donated 0 Cigars Donated 0 About Founders Cigar Company Founders began with a small group of friends who started meeting weekly for bonfires and cigars in the early days of the 2020 pandemic. At a time when the rest of the world was shut down, cigars served as a surprising catalyst for connection. Today, we’re here to provide you with premium cigars and the cigar education you’re looking for. Building stronger cigar communities Join Our Newsletter Facebook Instagram Youtube Our Story Our Founders Cigars Cigars 101 & Blogs Cigars For Warriors Contact Become a Dealer Buy Our Cigars Locally Our Story Our Founders Cigars Cigars 101 & Blogs Cigars For Warriors Contact Become a Dealer Buy Our Cigars Locally Shipping Return & Refund Policy Privacy Policy Warranty Policy Shipping Return & Refund Policy Privacy Policy Warranty Policy Copyright 2024 © Founders Cigar Company, LLC. Memberships Video Join the board Memberships Video Join the board Memberships Video Join the board Members Only Cigar Lounge A Tradition of Conversation, Culture, and Connection At The Boardroom , we don’t just create spaces—we craft experiences steeped in tradition, camaraderie, and class. A sophisticated luxury lounge where like-minded community of ladies and gentlemen tribute to centuries-old traditions where leaders, thinkers, and entertainers shape culture. The Boardroom Memberships SILVER $6,000 Invitations to complementary & ticketed Special Boardroom Events Limited Access to Lounge Guest Privileges; Bring 1 colleague per month Join Now GOLD $11,000 Invitations to complementary & ticketed Special Boardroom Events Limited Access to Lounge Guest Privileges; Bring 3 colleagues per month Personalized Locker 1 Box of PBD’s Limited Edition Cigar Join Now PLATINUM $17,000 Invitations to complementary & ticketed Special & Exclusive VIP Boardroom Events Secret Access to All Areas of the Lounge Guest Privileges; Bring 5 colleagues per month Personalized Locker Priority Reservations for Private Events and Meeting Rooms 2 Boxes of PBD’s Limited Edition Cigar Concierge Services Join Now join the board! Please complete the application if you’d like to be selected for a membership. You will be notified once our Membership Committee has reviewed your completed application. (166) • Casinos See More FAQ's What is the best way to purchase gift cards? The best way to purchase a gift card depends on whether you want to email or text the gift card to your recipient, give it to them in person, or mail a physical gift card to them. Here are some of the most popular methods to buy electronic and physical gift cards: On a third-party website In-person at the issuing store, restaurant, or other location On the issuing merchant's website On a bank-issued gift card website At a third-party store, such as Target Another option is to purchase a Giftly, which can be used in place of a gift card, and works for almost any national retailer or your favorite local business. How does Giftly work? You can send up to $1,000 to your recipient for any local or national merchant. Giftly will deliver your gift with a customized greeting card by email, text, mail, or printout. Your recipient will choose the most convenient way to receive the gift: as a Visa gift card in the mail, as a credit to their bank account, or as a credit to their PayPal account. While you can suggest a store, bar, restaurant, activity, or something else you think they'd like, your recipient can use the gift for anything they want. How do digital gift cards work? A digital gift card - also known as an electronic gift card (or e-gift card) - works just like a physical gift card but can be used for online purchases. Like a physical gift card, a digital gift card has some type of code or barcode that you can enter online when you're making online purchases. When you send a digital gift through Giftly, your recipient can choose the most convenient way to receive the gift: as a Visa gift card in the mail, as a credit to their bank account, or as a credit to their PayPal account. Can you buy gift cards online? Yes. You can purchase a Giftly, which works just like an online gift card, for almost any national retailer or your favorite local business. When you buy a Giftly online at Giftly.com, you can send it to your recipient via text, email, or print. Your recipient can then use the Giftly for anything that they like best, whether it's in person at a store or restaurant, or for online purchases. You can also sometimes buy gift cards online through a specific business's website. However, unlike a Giftly, your recipient can usually only redeem it at that one place. What is the safest way to buy gift cards? The most important thing about sending someone a gift is that it gets delivered safely and securely. The safest way to buy gift cards is through a company that you trust and to store the gift card in a safe place before you give it to someone. At Giftly, you can purchase a Giftly - which works like a universal gift card - in any amount up to $1,000 and send it to your recipient via text, email, or print. Throughout the process, you never have to worry about losing a physical gift card or buying a gift from a company you don't trust. How does someone redeem a gift card from Giftly? When you send a digital gift through Giftly, your recipient can choose the most convenient way to receive the gift: as a Visa gift card in the mail, as a credit to their bank account, or as a credit to their PayPal account. Giftly allows people to send monetary gifts to friends and family and suggest where to go and what to get with the gifted funds. Through Giftly, purchasers can suggest a specific business or business category to the recipient and include a personal note. While you can suggest a store, bar, restaurant, activity, or something else you think they'd like, your recipient can use the gift for anything they want. Can you send gift cards via email or text? Yes. You can buy a Giftly through an easy online process and send it to your recipient via email, text, or print. This works great because your recipient has the flexibility to redeem the gift as a Visa gift card in the mail, as a credit to their bank account, or as a credit to their PayPal account. Once the recipient has received the funds, they are free to spend them when and where they choose and can receive a Giftly Visa Gift Card to use in-store or online purchases. Do Giftly gifts expire? No. A Giftly gift never expires. You can buy a Giftly online at Giftly.com in any amount up to $1,000. Your recipient can then redeem the Giftly as a Visa gift card in the mail, as a credit to their bank account, or as a credit to their PayPal account. Then they can then use the Giftly for any purchases they want, whenever it is the most convenient for them. What are the most popular gift cards you can buy online? Sending someone an online gift card for a birthday, holiday, or another special occasion is a great way to celebrate them and show how much you care. Some of the most popular gift options from Giftly are: Target, Kohl's, Lululemon, Bath and Body Works, Ross.
